definitions.definition: Of a person, following the letter of the law.
examples: He's very legalistic , so let's hope the law is just and merciful as well as strict.

definitions.definition: Of a person, tending to resort to the law, as one who sues frequently.
examples: His legalistic tendencies irritated his neighbors, especially since they had to defend themselves against his frivolous suits.
She was legalistic in her observation of religious rules and traditions.

main_definition: Of a person, following the letter of the law.
secondary_definitions: Of a person, tending to resort to the law, as one who sues frequently.
